openings.description: Main entry door with wheelchair accessible ramp.
Large windows oriented to the north to maximize natural light while adhering to Vastu.
Doorway connecting main spaces with a minimalist design in line with Brutalist aesthetics.

vastu_notes.note: North-facing windows and entrances are recommended for optimum energy flow as per Vastu principles. The main entrance, positioned on the north side of the villa, enhances positive cosmic vibrations.
Spatial organization ensures that heavier elements (such as concrete structures and large furniture in living areas) are balanced with lighter decor to maintain equilibrium.

building_norms.description: All doorways, hallways, and common spaces have been designed with minimum width requirements and without abrupt level changes. Ramps and accessible facilities are provided as needed.
Design adheres to local building codes for load-bearing structures, fire safety, and seismic resistance.
